title: Thinking about making a guide of my Malzahar build that got me from Gold 5 to Plat 3
body: Would anyone be interested? I've been playing Malz for years now but always used other peoples guides and just felt like something was lacking. Tried out my own style and had so much success with it that it got me to Plat again. Just not sure if anyone would actually read it haha

replies.body:
Do it, If this is what works for you then share it with others.

This will also help with your understanding of it so you can change it to how you like
